update sys_download
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
img_id = #{imgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_title = #{fileTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_address = #{fileAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_type = #{fileType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
file_update_time = #{fileUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
file_size = #{fileSize,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
download_speed = #{downloadSpeed,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
download_state = #{downloadState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_remark = #{fileRemark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where download_id = #{downloadId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
